effect.black_white: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.

flavor_text.black_white: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.
